actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend section 4941 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, and section 101(1)(2) of the Tax Reform Act of 1969.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt in certain circumstances, the leasing of property by a corporation, all the stock of which is owned by a private foundation, to a person affiliated with the foundation, from the excise tax on self-dealing by private foundations. Extends specified temporary provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1969 which exempt certain transactions between private foundations and affiliated persons from the self-dealing tax.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 4941 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, and section 101(1)(2) of the Tax Reform Act of 1969.
